description: This file defines Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for note-related API requests and responses, including creation, updating, and retrieval of notes, along with a static method to transform a Note domain model into a response DTO.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new note, requiring a title and content with validation attributes.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing note, requiring a title and content with validation attributes.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO for returning note data, including a static From method to map from the domain model.

methods.name: NoteResponse.From
methods.description: Maps a Note domain object to a NoteResponse DTO.
